CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 29, 1945, pg. 9, reads: "Cocktail hour fetes the Chauncey Eskridges - Lieut. and Mrs. Chauncey Eskridge were feted Sunday at a "cocktail hour" at the home of Mr. and Mrs. Henry Lindsay, parents of the glamorous Rosyln Lindsay Eskridge. Scores of friends were present to have fun and add their best wishes for the future of this likeable couple, who are leaving soon to establish residence in Chicago.  Among the charming junior hostesses who helped to make the party a success were Mary Ellen Dehoney, Lois Buchanan, Helen Bolden, Barbara Jones, Enzee Mahoney, Alice L. Allen, Eloise Brown, Jayne Woodson and Louise Johnson.  in bottom picture the couple are shown with Mrs. Julia Eskridge, mother of Lieutenant Eskridge. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Roslyn or Rosalind Lindsay Eskridge wearing red tulle gown with light colored stripe and crown of flowers holding hands with Lieut. Chauncey Eskridge wearing military uniform, standing on stairs in living room of Lindsay home
